subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Shavian-to-QS transcriber and thoughts on Shavian/Quikscript unification
msgSnippet: Sure, but you can too. (it s one big .) I ve added some explanatory text inside the  to prompt typing/copy&pasting.
messageBody:
Sure, but you can too. (it's one big <textarea>.)

I've added some explanatory text inside the <textarea> to prompt typing/copy&pasting.

On May 26, 2013, at 9:01 AM, Michael Everson <everson@...> wrote:

> Can you fix the HTML in the top sample so it displays without "<small>" and so on?
>
> On 26 May 2013, at 07:52, Nathan Sharfi <bonusfrogs@...> wrote:
>
>> <http://www.frogorbits.com/qs/from-shavian/> does just that.
